text.section: An order to withhold and deliver shall be personally served or mailed by certified mail, return receipt requested, on the person in possession or control of the property and the obligor.
The order shall state the basis for and the amount of the support debt and that the obligor may offer a bond satisfactory to the cabinet to avoid losing possession of the property.

law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 411, sec. 25, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 144, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1984.
